name: Kuiper Tides
description:
A top-down game inspired by The Legend of Zelda. In Kuiper tides, you will navigate an alien base on an unknown dwarf planet in the Kuiper Belt. You’ll have to collect keys to navigate and progress further into the labyrinth, while battling its hostile inhabitants that reside in the base.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Spacebar -  Melee
